name: Just Witchin'
description:
You will experience a day cooking magic potions as the witch Raven, that is accompanied by her trusty familiar Rain, the owl. Look into your spellbook and remember which ingredients you have to gather from your magical herb garden. Then go to you cauldron and mix up the magic potion! Be aware, that your garden likes to play tricks and just grows want *it* wants and may not grow what you need.

Controls:
Mouse + left click to interact with environment. Use the icons on the screen edge to switch locations. (in the garden, you *have to* pick up 3 ingredients to move into another location)

Credits:

Lea - Art
Mathew - Audio
Maria - Layout Design, Art
Erinda - Programming
